body: Im bored and miss the server someone talk to me :(

title: I just miss the server :(

replies.body:
We have an unofficial community Discord if you're interested in talking to other players. Skype is also a pretty cool communication tool.

I'll go ahead and lock this thread as it is a spam topic and serves no real purpose on our forums.
